CustomField.description: A formula to evaluate on various criteria whether this fulfilment should appear on a list of ones needing chasing.
CustomField.formula:
OW_task_information_name__c = 'chase_transfer' && (FulfilmentStatus__c = 'Awaiting ad hoc action' || FulfilmentStatus__c = 'Chase client action' || FulfilmentStatus__c = 'Chase client payment' || FulfilmentStatus__c = 'Chase provider' || FulfilmentStatus__c = 'Chase transfer') && FulfilmentAmount__c > 5000 && FulfilmentDaysSinceSubmission__c > 9 && NOT(FulfilmentTransferType__c = 'Full' && FulfilmentDaysSinceSubmission__c < 18 && (FulfilmentProvider__c = 'Aviva' || FulfilmentProvider__c = 'Standard Life' || FulfilmentProvider__c = 'Scottish Widows')) &&
NOT(FulfilmentTransferType__c = 'Full' && FulfilmentAmount__c < 20000 && FulfilmentDaysSinceSubmission__c < 30 && (ISPICKVAL(RelatedFulfilment__r.Recommendation__r.SourceLegacy__r.TransferProcess__c, 'Origo') || ISPICKVAL(RelatedFulfilment__r.Recommendation__r.SourceLegacy__r.TransferProcess__c, '')))
CustomField.label: Fulfilment chaser view
